DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Role Follicular Sensitivity Index Prediction IVF/ICSI Outcome
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator study retrospective cohort study . Records woman vitro fertilization ( IVF ) intra-cytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) Dar AlTeb sub-fertility center January 2010 December 2013 review . All record miss data exclude . Triptorelin 0.1mg ( Decapeptyl® Ferring , Germany ) use pituitary down-regulation . It give 7 day expect time ovulation woman regular cycle . Women irregular cycle give combined oral contraceptive pill triptorelin start day 21 start pill . On second day menstruation serum FSH , LH , Prolactin Oestradiol assess antral follicular count ( AFC ) assess use vaginal ultrasound scan . AFC define number follicle measure 3-10mm . Controlled ovarian hyperstimulation ( COH ) start 2nd day menstruation use human menopausal gonadotrophin ( HMG ) ( Merional® IBSA , Switzerland ) . The initial dose range 150-300 IU/day . The COH drug dose adjust accord patient 's response guide number size follicle addition serum E2 value . COH continue least 3 follicle ≥17mm obtain . This follow administration Human chorionic gonadotrophin ( HCG ) ( Choriomon® , IBSA , Switzerland ) 10000 IU . On day HCG administration , ovarian ultrasound scan perform use transvaginal probe Preovulatory follicle count ( PFC ) assess , ( PFC ) define number follicle measuring≥16mm . FSI calculate ( FSI =PFC*10000/AFC*Total dose FSH ) Oocyte retrieval guide transvaginal ultrasound do 34-36 hour follow HCG administration . Fertilization do ICSI . 16-18 hour later , fertilization confirm presence 2 pronucleus . The procedure cancel less 3 follicle ≥17 mm size present 12 day start FSH despite dos reach 450 IU . The cycle also cancel risk ovarian hyperstimulation like massive ovarian enlargement serum estradiol exceed 3000pg/L The quality embryo assess day 3 accord number evenness blastomeres addition percentage fragmentation . Embryos classify 3 group : Excellent embryo contain 6-8 even blastomeres < 10 % fragmentation , moderate embryo contain 6-8 even uneven blastomere 10-20 % fragmentation , poor quality embryos contain less 6 blastomere > 20 % fragmentation . Embryo transfer do 5th day oocyte retrieval couple IVF/ICSI . If possible , 2 embryo transfer cryopreservation remain embryo offer . Luteal support give form progesterone vaginal tablet ( Prontogest® IBSA , Switzerland ) 400mg/day start day oocyte retrieval . A pregnancy test do 2 week embryo transfer clinical pregnancy define presence intrauterine gestational sac 5 week embryo transfer .
DOC.criteria: IVF/ICSI Missing data Cancelled cycle . Polycystic ovarian syndrome .
